user_profile.name: Carlos Mendoza
user_profile.description: Carlos is a 60-year-old athletic man from Bogotá, Colombia, with intermediate tech experience. Known for his analytical mind and direct communication style, he embraces challenges and is intuitively inclined toward making decisions that prioritize detail and practicality. Seeking to arrange transportation to a clinic for a routine check-up, Carlos values flexibility in scheduling and is determined to ensure a smooth journey, leveraging his visual learning style to navigate transportation options effectively.

instructions.dialogue: Use vague or ambiguous language about your needs.
instructions.profile: Be very reluctant to share your profile information.
instructions.hidden_state: Express very subtle emotions and intentions in your inner thoughts.

task_specific_attributes.timeline: Arrange at least 1 hour in advance or as needed based on urgency
task_specific_attributes.purchase_location: Transportation app or local service providers
additional_requirements: Option for a driver who is aware and considerate of older adults
